original: @ga_/bla ma phyi ltar sgrub pa'i man ngag🔽@/_bla ma sgrub pa'i rgya gzhung phyi sgrub ti blo pas mdzad pa bzhugs snyo//_@##/_/rgya
analyzed: @ga_/bla ma phyi ltar sgrub pa'i man ngag @/_bla ma sgrub pa'i rgya gzhung phyi sgrub ti blo pas mdzad pa bzhugs snyo//_@##/_/rgya
translated: The Guru Yoga of the Outer Practice🔽The Guru Yoga of the Outer Practice

original: gar skad du/_gu ru na mo lo ka_/bod skad du/_bla ma'i sgrub thabs/_rdo
analyzed: gar skad du/_gu ru na mo lo ka_/bod skad du/_bla ma'i sgrub thabs/_rdo
translated: The Guru Yoga of the Outer Practice🔽Homage to the vajra holder!🔽Those who wish to attain the state of Great Vajradhara

original: rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rdo rje 'chang chen tshhe 'dir thob 'dod pas/_/
analyzed: rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rdo rje 'chang chen tshhe 'dir thob 'dod pas/_/
translated: here and now🔽must rely on the guru’s path,🔽the ultimate path, the unsurpassed path.

original: lam gyi mthar thug bla na med pa'i lam/_/mos gus mthar thug bla ma'i mos gus
analyzed: lam gyi mthar thug bla na med pa'i lam/_/mos gus mthar thug bla ma'i mos gus
translated: The ultimate devotion is devotion to the guru,🔽the profound practice is the practice of the guru,

original: yin/_/sgrub pa zab mo bla ma'i sgrub pa ste/_/dam tshhig zab mo bla ma'i dam
analyzed: yin/_/sgrub pa zab mo bla ma'i sgrub pa ste/_/dam tshhig zab mo bla ma'i dam
translated: the profound samaya is the guru’s samaya,

original: tshhig la/_/rten 'brel zab mo bla ma'i rten 'brel mchog_/'bras bu mthar
analyzed: tshhig la/_/rten 'brel zab mo bla ma'i rten 'brel mchog_/'bras bu mthar
translated: the profound interdependence is the guru’s supreme interdependence,🔽and the ultimate result is the guru’s result.

original: phyin bla ma'i 'bras bu'o/_/de phyir bla ma sgrub la mkhas par bya/_/bla ma sa
analyzed: phyin bla ma'i 'bras bu'o/_/de phyir bla ma sgrub la mkhas par bya/_/bla ma sa
translated: Therefore, one should be skilled in the practice of the guru.🔽The guru is the nature of the ground,🔽the support of the animate and inanimate.

original: gzhi'i rang bzhin las/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu rten par byed/_/bla ma ye shes me chen
analyzed: gzhi'i rang bzhin las/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu rten par byed/_/bla ma ye shes me chen
translated: The guru is the great fire of wisdom,🔽the great ocean of compassion,🔽and the great mountain of loving-kindness.

original: las/_/sgrib gnyis bag chags bsreg par byed/_/bla ma'i byin rlabs rlung
analyzed: las/_/sgrib gnyis bag chags bsreg par byed/_/bla ma'i byin rlabs rlung
translated: The wind of the guru’s blessings🔽moves the qualities upward.

original: gis ni/_/yon tan gong du g.yo bar byed/_/bla ma'i thugs rje chu 'o las/_/
analyzed: gis ni/_/yon tan gong du g.yo bar byed/_/bla ma'i thugs rje chu 'o las/_/
translated: The water of the guru’s compassion🔽nourishes all beings.🔽The guru’s profound wisdom

original: 'gro ba kun gyi gso skyed mdzad/_/bla ma shes rab zab pa yis/_/ma rig mun
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi gso skyed mdzad/_/bla ma shes rab zab pa yis/_/ma rig mun
translated: dispels the darkness of ignorance.🔽The guru’s sun of skillful means

original: pa sel bar byed/_/bla ma thabs kyis nyi ma yi/_/nyon mongs rlan rnams
analyzed: pa sel bar byed/_/bla ma thabs kyis nyi ma yi/_/nyon mongs rlan rnams
translated: dries up the moisture of the afflictions.🔽The guru, pure like space,

original: skems par byed/_/bla ma mkha' ltar dag pa las/_/bdag 'dzin thams cad
analyzed: skems par byed/_/bla ma mkha' ltar dag pa las/_/bdag 'dzin thams cad
translated: destroys all self-grasping.🔽The medicine of the guru’s blessings

original: 'jig par byed/_/bla ma'i byin rlabs sman gyis ni/_/nad rnams thams cad
analyzed: 'jig par byed/_/bla ma'i byin rlabs sman gyis ni/_/nad rnams thams cad
translated: removes all illnesses.🔽The guru, like a wish-fulfilling tree,

original: sel bar byed/_/bla ma dpag bsam shing bzhin du/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu
analyzed: sel bar byed/_/bla ma dpag bsam shing bzhin du/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu
translated: bestows the fruit of all that is wished for.🔽The guru, like a viewing crystal,

original: ster bar byed/_/bla ma lta ba'i shel bzhin du/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos
analyzed: ster bar byed/_/bla ma lta ba'i shel bzhin du/_/mchog dang thun mong dngos
translated: produces the supreme and common siddhis.🔽The guru, like a wish-fulfilling jewel,

original: grub 'byung /_/bla ma yid bzhin nor bu ltar/_/phun sum tshhogs kun bskyed
analyzed: grub 'byung /_/bla ma yid bzhin nor bu ltar/_/phun sum tshhogs kun bskyed
translated: produces all the perfect qualities.

original: par byed/_/de phyir de la dam par byos/_/bla ma phyi ltar sgrub pa'i man ngag🔽rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ti lo pas mdzad pa rdzogs snyo//_//
analyzed: par byed/_/de phyir de la dam par byos/_/bla ma phyi ltar sgrub pa'i man ngag rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ti lo pas mdzad pa rdzogs snyo//_//
translated: Therefore, you should regard him as a holy being.🔽The esoteric instruction for accomplishing the outer guru🔽is complete.

original: rgya gar shar phyogs dza gad li'i pan+di ta bi bu ti tshan+d+ras/_dpal khan pa'i
analyzed: rgya gar shar phyogs dza gad li'i pan+di ta bi bu ti tshan+d+ras/_dpal khan pa'i
translated: The Indian master of yoga Vīrabhadra from Jāgaddala

original: dur khrod du sgra rang sgyur du bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: dur khrod du sgra rang sgyur du bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: translated this in the glorious cemetery of Śītavana.

original: bla ma phyi ltar sgrub pa'i man ngag
analyzed: bla ma phyi ltar sgrub pa'i man ngag
translated: The esoteric instruction for accomplishing the outer guru
